Name: Dana Asper
Comment: OYE this would be fabulous to have to help manage all sorts of events news and featured content. The filter feature doesnt always provide the options I need and this would solve a lot of issues and have a lot of uses.

Comment: I also agree this would be very helpful for swapping promotional items events and promotions.

Comment: Please Please Please develop this. It's the perfect solution to running promotional landing pages and merchandising.
